description: The Shinsengumi are the police force working for the bakufu, based on the historical counterpart going by the same name. http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao], its current leader, reformed the old http://anidb.net/ch100121 [Roshigumi] organization, also formed by bakufu in order to steer thugs into fighting against http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Joi rebels].
name: Shinsengumi
